Qualifications.body: At least 1 year of experience working as a frontend developer.
Good knowledge of javascript frameworks preferably React JS.
In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and front-end languages.
Knowledge of REACT tools including React.js, Webpack, Redux, and Flux.
Knowledge of performance testing frameworks including Mocha and Jest.
Experience with browser-based debugging and performance testing software.
Willingness to learn new technologies and improve yourself.
